meta.googleDescription: Le suivi de votre enfant à la crèche. Accédez à toutes les informations qui comptent: activités, siestes, repas, selles, etc.

heading: Terms and conditions
text:
The website accessible at the address https://kidola.lu/ (here after the « Website ») is published and operated by the company Kidola S.à.r.l. , a public limited company, which registered office is located 9 Rue du Laboratoire, 1911 Luxembourg and is registered with the Company and Trade Register of Luxembourg under the number B245482, its Intra-Community VAT number is LU32261276. The contact email address is the following: hello@kidola.lu and the contact phone number is : +336 6 58 74 38 34. The Website' publishing director is Quentin de Madre.

The Website is hosted by the company OVH SAS, a French simplified joint-stock company which registered office is located 2, rue Kellermann, 59100 Roubaix, France and is registered with the Trade and Business Register of Lille Métropole under the number 424 761 419.
